allowDrop.description: Whether to allow drag and drop in the dropzone element

disabled.description: Whether the file input is disabled

files.description: The current value of the file input

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  dropzone: string
  hiddenInput: string
  trigger: string
  label: string
  item(id: string): string
  itemName(id: string): string
  itemSizeText(id: string): string
  itemPreview(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements. Useful for composition.

locale.description: The current locale. Based on the BCP 47 definition.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum file size in bytes

minFileSize.description: The minimum file size in bytes

name.description: The name of the underlying file input

onFileAccept.description: Function called when the file is accepted

onFileReject.description: Function called when the file is rejected

onFilesChange.description: Function called when the value changes, whether accepted or rejected
